title: Twenty Tiny Tales
description: An updated and expanded version of the original, now featuring extra content.Perfectly formed little nibbles, suitable for reading at the bus stop, tube trip or tea break. Escape from the moment...short, sharp, "Like a kiddy falling into a sweetie shop at midnight" - Combat Wombat"These twenty tales are wonderful, witty, engaging and, most of all, fun" - Tom Lichtenberg"A delightful collection" - Sarah"Quirky and great fun" - DeanT".. great book, highly recommended.." - Fickle Tickle".. each one gave me a smile.." - Cirrus".. fresh and often surprising.." - markprime".. a great collection of tiny tales.." - Cobra N"Terrible" - Algy Lacey
author: Willie Wit
